subject: Your Refinace Approval
body:
Mort updates,

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?  Refinance us lowest rate.  Your loan approval is waiting.

You can receive $295,000 for
$687 per month save 45%.

Pls respond T0day. 
http://ilook.tw/lcko7

Sammie Dejesus
Mtg Center


Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines, Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream.  Mark Twain [Samuel Langhornne Clemens] (1835-1910)
